price: ߛߐ߲߬ߡߊ ߟߎ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߸ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߕߏߕߐ߫ ߔߊߦߌߔߊߦߌ ߖߊ߲߰ߞߕߊ ߟߋ߬ ߘߐ߫
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ فِي عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: inna al-muj'rimīna fī ʿadhābi jahannama khālidūna
